channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenMage -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenMage -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-23617|2023-01-27T23:24:33.249Z -- openmage -- magento-lts
item.description: OpenMage LTS is an e-commerce platform. Versions prior to 19.4.22 and 20.0.19 contain an infinite loop in malicious code filter in certain conditions. Versions 19.4.22 and 20.0.19 have a fix for this issue. There are no known workarounds.

item.title: CVE-2023-41879|2023-09-11T21:14:28.597Z -- openmage -- magento-lts
item.description: Magento LTS is the official OpenMage LTS codebase. Guest orders may be viewed without authentication using a "guest-view" cookie which contains the order's "protect_code". This code is 6 hexadecimal characters which is arguably not enough to prevent a brute-force attack. Exposing each order would require a separate brute force attack. This issue has been patched in versions 19.5.1 and 20.1.1.
